column4: hi, how can I use scp to copy files from one pc to another without needing a password (I want to incorporate it in a script to do backups accross our LAN) I have tried following a guide but I get lost...
uh huh, let me try that. Thanks :D
now I get "connection closed by IP" - lost connection
sorry that doesnt make sense to me :(
type that from your home dir
sigh. let me try again. do this: ssh-keygen -t dsa
now do this from your home dir: scp .ssh/id_dsa.pub some_server:~/.ssh/authorized_keys2
where "some_server" is the name of the server
now try and ssh to the machine
ok it works, thank you so much!
